title: Anthropic Launches Its Most Powerful Models for Coding Yet
author: Frederic Lardinois
description: Anthropic launched Claude Opus 4 and Sonnet 4, its best models yet for coding, with built-in tool usage and more.
cntitle: Anthropic 发布其迄今为止最强大的编码模型
cndescription: Anthropic 推出了 Claude Opus 4 和 Sonnet 4，这是他们目前最优秀的编码模型，内置工具使用等功能。
